br_FR {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "F",
            "FRF ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Breton language locale for France" }
        Source { "Denise.Peden@enst-bretagne.fr (Denise Derrien-Peden)" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "Pablo Saratxaga" }
        Email { "pablo@mandrakesoft.com" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Breton" }
        Territory { "France" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.54" }
        Date { "2001-01-28" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "[oOyY].*" }
        NoExpression { "[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            "",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,#0.##;-#,#0.##",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,#0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "33" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    " ",
                    " ",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hhemm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
                    "D'ar EEEE dd a viz MMMM yyyy",
                    "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
                    "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "sul",
                            "lun",
                            "meu",
                            "mer",
                            "yao",
                            "gwe",
                            "sad",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "sul",
                            "lun",
                            "meurzh",
                            "merc'her",
                            "yaou",
                            "gwener",
                            "sadorn",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Gen ",
                            "C'hw",
                            "Meu ",
                            "Ebr ",
                            "Mae ",
                            "Eve ",
                            "Gou ",
                            "Eos ",
                            "Gwe ",
                            "Her ",
                            "Du  ",
                            "Ker ",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Genver",
                            "C'hwevrer",
                            "Meurzh",
                            "Ebrel",
                            "Mae",
                            "Mezheven",
                            "Gouere",
                            "Eost",
                            "Gwengolo",
                            "Here",
                            "Du",
                            "Kerzu",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
